About me

Hello, my name is Kabir and I am a third year computer science student at the University of Toronto.

Last summer I worked as a full-stack software engineering intern at Rakuten in Tokyo, Japan. After I finished my internship at Rakuten, I completed another software engineering internship at Flagship, also in Tokyo.
